title: Whole Team Disconnect
body: I was playing a ranked game as Tristana and in the middle of the game, when we were about to engage on the enemy champions, everyone in my team including myself disconnected. I tried connecting to the game and succeeded yet our team's base was practically in shambles at that point. I don't know what happened and would like to know what happened. Thank you.

replies.body: Hmmmm without much more info it kinda sounds like this was just a random dc mid game. I'd first try to see if using an ethernet connection would be more stable as well as running through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still in order there.
